content:
STANDARD OPERATING PROCEDURE

Title: Quality Management System
Document ID: SOP-001
Version: 2.1
Effective Date: 2024-01-01

Purpose:
This SOP defines the quality management system procedures.

Scope:
Applies to all manufacturing operations.

Responsibilities:
Quality Manager: Overall responsibility
Production Manager: Implementation

Definitions:
GMP: Good Manufacturing Practice
QMS: Quality Management System

Procedure:
1. Review incoming materials
2. Conduct in-process testing
3. Document all results
4. Release products meeting specifications

References:
- ICH Q7 (2000)
- ISO 13485:2016
- 21 CFR Part 820

Revision History:
Version 1.0 - Initial release (2023-01-01)
Version 2.0 - Updated procedures (2023-06-01)
Version 2.1 - Minor corrections (2024-01-01)

Approvals:
Prepared by: J. Smith, Quality Manager
Reviewed by: M. Johnson, Operations Director
Approved by: R. Davis, VP Quality

QUALITY MANUAL

Title: Corporate Quality Manual
Document ID: QM-001
Version: 3.0
Effective Date: 2024-02-01

Purpose:
This manual defines our quality management system in accordance with ISO 13485 requirements.

Scope:
Applies to all activities related to the design, development, production, installation and servicing of medical devices.

Responsibilities:
CEO: Ultimate responsibility for quality policy
Quality Manager: Day-to-day management of QMS
Department Heads: Implementation within their areas

Definitions:
QMS: Quality Management System
CAPE: Corrective and Preventive Action
DHF: Design History File
DMR: Device Master Record

Procedure:
1. Establish quality objectives
2. Implement quality procedures
3. Monitor effectiveness through audits
4. Continuous improvement through management review
5. Maintain documentation and records

References:
- ISO 13485:2016 Medical devices — Quality management systems
- ISO 14971:2019 Medical devices — Application of risk management
- 21 CFR Part 820 Quality System Regulation
- EU MDR 2017/745 Medical Device Regulation

Revision History:
Version 1.0 - Initial release (2022-01-01) - Major update for ISO 13485:2016
Version 2.0 - Updated for EU MDR compliance (2023-01-01) - Added MDR requirements
Version 3.0 - Annual review update (2024-02-01) - Minor procedural updates

Approvals:
Prepared by: Sarah Wilson, Quality Manager (2024-01-15)
Reviewed by: Dr. Michael Chen, VP Regulatory Affairs (2024-01-20)
Approved by: Jennifer Martinez, CEO (2024-01-25)
